entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:55 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
